title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10052.3 - Environmental impact statement procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10052.3 - Environmental impact statement procedures

State Regulations

When the authority is the lead agency with respect to an
action it has determined may have a significant adverse effect on the
environment and it has directed the preparation of an environmental impact
statement, the authority will utilize the applicable procedures set forth in 6
NYCRR
617.9, 617.11, and
617.12
in proceeding therewith. Depending on the
particular action(s), the authority may also utilize the applicable procedures
set forth in 6 NYCRR
617.8
(relating to scoping) and 6 NYCRR
617.10
(relating
to generic environmental impact statements), as the authority deems
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10052.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
